DefaultEvent.Description: There is no cart this time. This will be a long walk.
DefaultEvent.Name: She bids you follow her into the Reaches

ChildBranches.Name: The Secret of the Nocturne
ChildBranches.Description: Here is what they sent you to find. Hopefully.

Description: Hospitality or not, you sense it would be a very bad idea to return empty-handed. A Weaver stands ready to receive the good news.
Name: Report back to the Web of Stone
